version_description:
■ Added Halloween Season Event
Enter the Garden of Witches and defeat Witch's Pawn and Cursed Candy!

■ Added Special Check-in Event
7 Days Check-in Event has been added to celebrate Grand Launching. Log in every day and receive a lot of rewards!

■ Fixed some bugs for enjoying MonsterCry Eternal on comfortable condition.

■ Added Halloween Season Event
Enter the Garden of Witches and defeat Witch's Pawn and Cursed Candy!

■ Added Special Check-in Event
7 Days Check-in Event has been added to celebrate Grand Launching. Log in every day and receive a lot of rewards!

■ Fixed some bugs for enjoying MonsterCry Eternal on comfortable condition.

■ Increased max level capacity to 70.
 
■ Added 2 new World Dungeons.
 Strong monsters are waiting for you from new dungeons.
 
■ Expanded Tower of Souls stage to 30.
 Clear the 30th stage and obtain SSS card!
 
■ Increased Arena reward.
 Build your own deck and enjoy real-time duel with other global Adventurers.
 
■ Added card review and grade system.
 Share your thoughts, strategies, and tactics for the card with other Adventurers.
 
■ Added various new cards.
 Meet the new special card Bellistra.
 
■ Fixed some bugs for enjoying MonsterCry Eternal on comfortable condition.

■ Increased max level capacity to 70.
 
■ Added 2 new World Dungeons.
 Strong monsters are waiting for you from new dungeons.
 
■ Expanded Tower of Souls stage to 30.
 Clear the 30th stage and obtain SSS card!
 
■ Increased Arena reward.
 Build your own deck and enjoy real-time duel with other global Adventurers.
 
■ Added card review and grade system.
 Share your thoughts, strategies, and tactics for the card with other Adventurers.
 
■ Added various new cards.
 Meet the new special card Bellistra.
 
■ Fixed some bugs for enjoying MonsterCry Eternal on comfortable condition.

■ Added 7 SSS+ cards.
 Build the tactical deck with new cards.

■ Expanded Tower of Souls stage to 36.
 Clear the 36th stage and obtain SSS card as a first clear reward. Also, obtain SSS+ Soulstone for repeatable clear reward.

■ Added new Boss Raid Hydra from Raid Portal.
 Above Level 60 adventurers can participate this content that can achieve Legendary tier equipment from Hydra.
 Build the raid deck with global users to defeat Hydra! Hydra is waiting for your challenge!

■ Added special dungeons those can enter for different days of the week.
 Gold dungeon opens on Monday, Wednesday, and Friday. Material dungeon opens on Tuesday, Thursday, Saturday, and Sunday.

■ Added Legendary tier equipment.
 This equipment can be obtained from Raid Portal or through crafting.

■ Rebalanced few SSS cards.

■ Fixed some bugs for enjoying MonsterCry Eternal on comfortable condition.

■ Added 7 SSS+ cards.
 Build the tactical deck with new cards.

■ Expanded Tower of Souls stage to 36.
 Clear the 36th stage and obtain SSS card as a first clear reward. Also, obtain SSS+ Soulstone for repeatable clear reward.

■ Added new Boss Raid Hydra from Raid Portal.
 Above Level 60 adventurers can participate this content that can achieve Legendary tier equipment from Hydra.
 Build the raid deck with global users to defeat Hydra! Hydra is waiting for your challenge!

■ Added special dungeons those can enter for different days of the week.
 Gold dungeon opens on Monday, Wednesday, and Friday. Material dungeon opens on Tuesday, Thursday, Saturday, and Sunday.

■ Added Legendary tier equipment.
 This equipment can be obtained from Raid Portal or through crafting.

■ Rebalanced few SSS cards.

■ Fixed some bugs for enjoying MonsterCry Eternal on comfortable condition.

■ Increased max level capacity to 75.

■ Added new World Dungeon 'Lake of Silence'.
 Strong monsters are waiting for you from new dungeon.

■ Added 9 SSS cards.
 Build the tactical deck with new cards.

■ Added 2018 New Year Event
 Collect the tickets from World Dungeons and enter the New Year Event Dungeon!

■ Rebalanced few SSS cards.

■ Fixed some bugs for enjoying MonsterCry Eternal on comfortable condition.

■ Increased max level capacity to 75.

■ Added new World Dungeon 'Lake of Silence'.
 Strong monsters are waiting for you from new dungeon.

■ Added 9 SSS cards.
 Build the tactical deck with new cards.

■ Added 2018 New Year Event
 Collect the tickets from World Dungeons and enter the New Year Event Dungeon!

■ Rebalanced few SSS cards.

■ Fixed some bugs for enjoying MonsterCry Eternal on comfortable condition.

■ Added 3 SSS+ cards and 5 SSS cards.
   Build the tactical deck with new cards.

■ Rebalanced Jerome Orlando SSS+ card.

■ Added Daily Achievement Event.

■ Increased 30 Days Check-in rewards. 
   New Adventurer Check-in reward remains same as before.

■ Fixed some bugs for enjoying MonsterCry Eternal on comfortable condition.

■ Added 3 SSS+ cards and 5 SSS cards.
   Build the tactical deck with new cards.

■ Rebalanced Jerome Orlando SSS+ card.

■ Added Daily Achievement Event.

■ Increased 30 Days Check-in rewards. 
   New Adventurer Check-in reward remains same as before.

■ Fixed some bugs for enjoying MonsterCry Eternal on comfortable condition.

■ Added Upper Stage of Tower of Souls. 
   Fallen and contaminated souls are waiting for the Adventurers from the Upper Stage of Tower of Souls!

■ Added Synthesis Mileage system.
   Earning the mileage points by synthesizing SSS card. You can get SSS+ card with this mileage points.

■  Added new merchandise.

■ Fixed some bugs for enjoying MonsterCry Eternal on comfortable condition.

■ Added Upper Stage of Tower of Souls. 
   Fallen and contaminated souls are waiting for the Adventurers from the Upper Stage of Tower of Souls!

■ Added Synthesis Mileage system.
   Earning the mileage points by synthesizing SSS card. You can get SSS+ card with this mileage points.

■  Added new merchandise.

■ Fixed some bugs for enjoying MonsterCry Eternal on comfortable condition.

■ Added the Cleared Star information from the Tower of Souls: Upper Stage ranking.
■ Fixed some bugs for enjoying MonsterCry Eternal on comfortable condition.

■ Added the Cleared Star information from the Tower of Souls: Upper Stage ranking.
■ Fixed some bugs for enjoying MonsterCry Eternal on comfortable condition.

Spring has arrived at Kerkin world.
Spring season special! 7-day attendance event, new cards, and more, the richness of the enjoyment has been updated.

• Added 3 SSS+ cards and 5 SSS cards.
• Added new 7-day special attendance event.
• Added Combined Event system.
• Expanded Tower of Souls: Upper Stage to 18th.
• Increased EXP rewards from World Dungeon.
• Rebalanced few SSS+ and SSS cards.
• Improvements and bug fixes.

Spring has arrived at Kerkin world.
Spring season special! 7-day attendance event, new cards, and more, the richness of the enjoyment has been updated.

• Added 3 SSS+ cards and 5 SSS cards.
• Added new 7-day special attendance event.
• Added Combined Event system.
• Expanded Tower of Souls: Upper Stage to 18th.
• Increased EXP rewards from World Dungeon.
• Rebalanced few SSS+ and SSS cards.
• Improvements and bug fixes.

Adventurers! Max level capacity has increased!
And the richness of the enjoyment has been updated.

• Increased max level capacity to 80.
• Added new World Dungeon 'Dragon's Nest'.
• Added Elite Hydra level 75 and 80 from Raid Portal.
• Added 8 SSS cards.
• Improvements and bug fixes.

Adventurers! Max level capacity has increased!
And the richness of the enjoyment has been updated.

• Increased max level capacity to 80.
• Added new World Dungeon 'Dragon's Nest'.
• Added Elite Hydra level 75 and 80 from Raid Portal.
• Added 8 SSS cards.
• Improvements and bug fixes.

• Added new Guild Raid: Dimensional Rift.
• Added Guild Store.
• Bug fixes.

• Added new Guild Raid: Dimensional Rift.
• Added Guild Store.
• Bug fixes.
• Bug fixes.
• Bug fixes.

• The second dungeon of Heavenial, ‘Herald Ruins’, is added.
• Tier Mythical-Apotheon’s Armors are added.
• Can apply skills on Legendary and Mythical Armors.
• Two of SSS+ cards and four of SSS Cards are added.
• A Special dungeon, [Treasure Ship] is opened.
• Can change your Adventurer Name.
• Rewards for Guild rank in Dimensional Rift are refined.
• Improvements and bugfixes.

• The third theme, 'Pitch Black Canyon' of Part.2 Heavenial added.
• Tier Mythical-Apotheon's accessories added.
• You can apply skills on Legendary and Mythical accessories.
• Two of SSS+ cards and four of SSS cards added.
• The cost of card level-up reduced.
• You can adjust the speed of 'AUTO'.
• Improvements and bugfixes.

1st Anniversary of MonsterCry Eternal with Halloween! Check it out!
• Upcoming events for 1st Anniversary of MonsterCry Eternal!
• Halloween Pop-up Store opened.
• A Special Dungeon [Radill Cemetery] opened.
• For Halloween only! 1 SSS+ card and 1 SSS card added.
• You can challenge your friend to a duel.
• You can set the order of the skills to be used first in Auto-Battle.
• Improvements and bugfixes.

Let's share the new beginning of various changes with the new title, Dragon Chronicles!

• The title has changed to 'Dragon Chronicles'.
• Heavenial Elite Mode added.
• 4 New Cards added.
• New Adventurer Guide added. 
• Improvements and bugfixes.

Let's share the new beginning of various changes with the new title, Dragon Chronicles!

• The title has changed to 'Dragon Chronicles'.
• Heavenial Elite Mode added.
• 4 New Cards added.
• New Adventurer Guide added. 
• Improvements and bugfixes.

3rd Anniversary of Dragon Chronicles with Halloween! 
Do not miss this chance to win a SSS+ Card!

• Upcoming events for 3rd Anniversary of Dragon Chronicles!
• 2 New SSS+ Cards added.
• For Halloween only, 1 new Halloween Card added.
• A Special Dungeon 'Pumpkin's 3rd Birthday Party' opened.
• The second area of Heavenial Elite mode, ‘Herald Ruins’, added.
• Tower of Souls 'Upper levels' expended to Floor 54.
• Improvements and bugfixes.
